title: Apple could be working on a 20-inch Mac/iPad hybrid
content:
Apple is usually late to the party, but when it finally arrives, it typically has a few tricks up its sleeve. The company has a history of releasing products a bit late when compared to its rivals. However, they tend to include an innovative twist or simply have a more solid build. Foldables happen to

The post Apple could be working on a 20-inch Mac/iPad hybrid appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple could be working on a 20-inch Mac/iPad hybrid foldable device. The rumored product could potentially be released around 2026.
